attributes.review: Every time I opened the app, my phone would crash. All of the other news related apps on my phone would move slow and eventually crash. When the app would work, all of the information was distorted and I couldn’t read it clearly. Very slow & not worth it
attributes.title: Kept Crashing My Phone

attributes.review:
Donald Trump is probably one of the most stupid and idiotic people to ever roam this planet. Why would ANYONE want a racist and a rapist as a present. If trump didn’t wait so long to close air travel, no one would have needed to be in quarantine for 3 months, and the US wouldn’t be the leading country with the most coronavirus cases. The only place Donald trump belongs in is prison. 

🌸✨trump 2020🧚‍♀️🦋but make it behind Barrs💅😚
attributes.title: Stupid piece of crap

attributes.review: I got this app cause I heard it was a cool app to watch 60 sec videos but instead when I opened it there was just some 🍊orange🍊✨ looking at me it made me very uncomfortable and I didn’t enjoy how long it took to even install I waited 365 days for it to download *ArE yOu LoSt BaByGoRl* so I definitely wouldn’t recommend this app it’s not at all enjoyable🧚🏻😉
attributes.title: Worst app ever #isthisnotinstagram #lol #fyp

attributes.review: i was expecting to see a actual president when i opened the app, but that is not what i saw. i saw a racist, homophobic, transphobic, sexist, rapist on there. i didn’t want to see a fat ugly cheeto. who let him have power. he is a know rapist and has said on live tv that he is sexually attracted to his own daughter. he is ruining everyone’s lives. he isn’t even smart. he is a disgusting animal.
attributes.title: AWFUL

attributes.review: i downloaded this app, and it took four days to install into my phone. when it finally finished installing, i opened up the app and my phone shut off. i have tried to turn my phone back on, and even went to a tech support store. they said that i need a new phone now. i can’t believe that this is happening. biden 2020!
attributes.title: ASTRONOMICALLY TERRIBLE

attributes.review: This app is terrible! The most terrible app in every country, maybe even of all time! It wants to open before it's safe to do so and I'm pretty sure it has that nasty China Virus. It also made me crave Cheetos so now I'm overweight. I know this better than anyone. There's not a single person who knows more about apps than I do, and this one is horrible!
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: the app took several days to download and when i finally opened it it told me to go back to my country even though I am a 58 year old white woman named Karen. Unbelievable. Afterwards it took all of my data from my phone and sent it over to China and Russia so they could spy on us. I cant believe our great president’s app would do this. 0/10
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: I downloaded the app which took about 3 day. When i finally got it, i was exited to support my amazing oompa loompa of a president ❤️❤️. I went about my day doing whatever trump supporters do, then i felt it. My stomach started rumbling, so i rushed to my american flag toilet. I spent hours in the bathroom, and this kept going for days. It finally stopped when i deleted the app.
attributes.title: gave me diarrhea

attributes.review: This app is just awful. The layout of the material is awful and makes no sense. It took me days to find out how to take surveys on it and after that I found out that all of my pictures were gone from my camera roll!!! I tried to contact them to ask why and they hung up on me! Unbelievable
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: 0/10 wouldn’t recommend. There’s some family that’s being held in cages, he wants to find the police even more 🥰and DEFUND the public SCHOOLING 🥰. Also he gives me a very... pervert vibe, he has 3 different baby mamas 🥰😍🔫, has a bounty over his head, and also is a sex offender 🥰😍😀.
